item.title: About Bible Reader
item.description: I created a Bible reader for Android. It is an open source project, under the Apache license. The app is simple and easy-to-use, with minimalist design. It supports offline reading, multi-versions, full-text search, and many other features, while maintaining a small download and install size. You can download the it from here. Recent changes are listed here. Feel free to request new features or report bugs here. Donations If you would like to support this project, feel free to donate.
